title: BRIEF-Widepoint Awarded Follow-On Task Order For Cellular Wireless Managed Services By U.S. Department Of Homeland Security
text: March 6, 2018 / 11:49 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Widepoint Awarded Follow-On Task Order For Cellular Wireless Managed Services By U.S. Department Of Homeland Security Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 6 (Reuters) - Widepoint Corp: * WIDEPOINT AWARDED FOLLOW-ON TASK ORDER FOR CELLULAR WIRELESS MANAGED SERVICES BY THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HOMELAND SECURITY HEADQUARTERS * WIDEPOINT CORP - AWARD, WITH A TOTAL AMOUNT VALUED AT MORE THAN $4.6 MILLLION, IS FOR BASE PERIOD FROM MARCH THROUGH NOVEMBER 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
